items.title: Why I’m canceling my Southwest credit card — and what I’m getting instead
items.description: Southwest Airlines' credit card revamp has made my cobranded card almost useless. Here are the other airline cards I'm considering getting instead.

items.title: The best relaxing adults-only, all-inclusive resorts for a kid-free vacation
items.description: Some of the world’s most luxurious hotels are embracing the all-inclusive model — and some are adults-only. Here are TPG's favorites.

items.title: Chase’s 5/24 rule: Everything you need to know
items.description: You've heard about Chase's infamous 5/24 rule for credit cards, but what does it mean and how does it work? Read our comprehensive guide to find out.

items.title: Why I choose to earn Chase Ultimate Rewards points over Amex Membership Rewards points
items.description: Holding both Amex and Chase cards help me earn to valuable and flexible points, but I prefer earning Chase points more than Amex points. Here's why.
